job_description: Senior Electrical Engineer - Firmware and Hardware R&D - job post Pure Biomass 2 reviews Pure Biomass in Encinitas, CA 92024 $65 - $115 an hour -  Full-time, Part-time, Temporary Pure Biomass 2 reviews Read what people are saying about working here. Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $65 - $115 an hour Job Type Full-time Part-time Temporary Pure Biomass is seeking a talented engineer to help us design a submersible robotic system to aid in our process for large-scale algae cultivation. We are looking for a creative engineer who can design and program robotic systems and execute those designs by constructing prototypes and programming hardware. The work also requires designing a control system (such as a PLC with TCP/IP Modbus protocol) to allow for mesh networking and provide the user with an intuitive interface to control our photo-bioreactor system and the enclosed robotic harvest apparatus. Proof of concept has been attained, and we are moving towards a beta-prototype so we can enter the market. Primary Responsibilities and Duties include, but are not limited to: Minimum Education: Bachelor of Science in Electrical or Computer Engineering At least 5 years of engineering experience Experience with embedded system design, motor control, common serial communication interfaces, wireless communication Proficient with embedded programming, PCB design, Altium preferred Proficient in analog, low-speed digital circuit design, and cable assembly design Experienced in embedded C/C++ and Python Familiar with MODBUS communication protocol Experience with PLC programming for valve and equipment control (Allen Bradley, Siemens, etc.) Program micro-controllers and implement sensors/transducers. This could include signal conditioning amplifier design, C/C++ programming, and communication protocol implementation Proficient in using various capture, layout, and simulation software such as Cadence, Eagle, and Altium Performing both technical drawings and calculations are a must prior to building a prototype Creativity in drawing from multiple industries to address the needs of the reactor Resourcefulness to achieve the desired results at a low cost Friendliness to have a good time while working hard within a team atmosphere Flexibility of schedule and mind to follow leads while things are working, and troubleshooting skills to resolve issues when they are not Problem solving, goal-oriented, and self-directing attributes a must Soft Skills Strong communication, interpersonal, and relationship development skills. Creative skills and ability to experiment to attain new, better strategies, approaches, and solutions to challenges. Flexibility and willingness to take on various tasks, and ability to work effectively in a highly collaborative team environment. Detail oriented. Project management experience. Training in active listening and constructive communication techniques such as Non‚ÄêViolent Communication, meeting facilitation, etc. Experience and/ or understanding of working within a start-up company. Punctuality Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Temporary Pay: $65.00 - $115.00 per hour Benefits: Dental insurance Flexible schedule Health insurance Experience level: 5 years Schedule: 8 hour shift Ability to commute/relocate: Encinitas, CA 92024: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Experience: Electrical engineering: 4 years (Preferred) License/Certification: Driver's License (Required) Work Location: In person Health insurance If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
